testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.subtitle: Brokers who generate more revenue with ClickOn

moncef.name: Moncef Zaghry
moncef.content: I was pleasantly surprised to receive two serious referrals from the very first send. I expected it to take four to five months before seeing results from this program.

mark.name: Mark-Anthony Barbieri
mark.content: I quickly understood the value of this initiative. It's a brilliant strategy to get the client's response to the 'question of the month'. This element alone triggers a conversation with my clients, as I always take the time to wish them 'Good luck' for the contest. This simple exchange (with a reminder to 'contact me for any mortgage questions') generates sales. Even after several years in the industry… it's never too late to innovate!

clubPrivilege.title: Experience the
clubPrivilege.description: As a broker, it's essential to know what your clients receive. Sign up for our demo list to receive our campaign examples and see for yourself the quality of our communications.

demo.title: Ready to generate more leads?
demo.description: Speak with a loyalty specialist to see how ClickOn can transform your clients into revenue.

benefits.freeAnalysis: Free analysis of your client base

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ClickOn

contact.question: How does ClickOn contact my former clients?
contact.answer: ClickOn uses a combination of personalized emails, SMS and automated calls based on your preferences. Our AI analyzes the best time and channel for each client.

results.question: How long before seeing results?
results.answer: Most of our clients receive their first qualified leads within 7 to 14 days of activation. Results continuously improve over time.

crm.question: Does ClickOn work with my current CRM?
crm.answer: Yes! ClickOn easily integrates with the major CRMs on the market. You can also import your contacts via a simple Excel or CSV file.
